mapper.sql: id, js_id, jylx, xylx, zsmk_id, jsxm, zsmkmc, kcmc, kcdm, kclx, kcxs, kcxf, kkxq, kkxy, skfs, sfbx, bz, sczt, cjsj, cjr, gxsj, gxr
mapper.select:
select kc.id as id,xylx,zsmk_id as zsmkId,jylx,kcmc,kcdm,kclx,kcxs,kcxf,kkxq,kkxy,skfs,jxjy,jcfj,kj,ja,kjsp,sp,sfsc,sfbx,bz,sfxf,cjsj,cjr,gxsj,gxr from t_kc kc
kc.sfsc = false and kc.kclx like trim(#{kclx}) and kc.jylx like trim(#{jylx}) and kc.xylx like trim(#{xylx}) and (kc.kcdm like concat('%',trim(#{name}),'%') or kc.kcmc like concat('%',trim(#{name}),'%'))
order by field(kc.kclx,'theory_class','practice_course','practical_training'), kc.cjsj desc
select kc.* from t_kc kc where kc.sfsc = false and kc.xylx = (select pc.xylx from t_pc pc where pc.sfsc = false and pc.id = #{pcId})
select kc.id as kcId, kc.zsmk_id, kc.kcdm, kc.kcmc, kc.kcxs from t_kc kc where kc.sfsc = false and kc.xylx = (select xylx from t_pc pc where pc.sfsc = false and pc.id = #{pcId})

select kc.id as id,kc.jylx as jylx,kc.xylx as xylx,kc.kclx as kclx,kc.kcmc as kcmc,kc.kcdm as kcdm,kc.kcxs as kcxs,kc.kkxq as kkxq,kc.kkxy as kkxy,kc.sfbx as sfbx,sz.dsxm as dsxm from t_kc kc left join t_kc_sz kcsz on kcsz.kc_id =kc.id left join t_sz sz on kcsz.sz_id = sz.id where kc.sfsc = false and sz.sfsc = false and kc.xylx = #{xylx} order by kc.cjsj desc
